thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 19 of 189
thread.title: Linda Searls

author: Linda Searls
title: Linda Searls
text: Shaun was very polite and helpful. Excellent customer service. Had issue with free trail extension and having our account charged. Was offered an extension of free trail but we have filled the position and do not need service at this time but will certainly consider using Zip Recruiter in the future. The fee is in process of being refunded. Thank you
